rewards.description: ABI’s Full Release is now live! To celebrate the launch of S3 on Steam and Epic, we've prepared a New Round Exclusive Streamers Support Event—this time, we’re releasing 4 new streamer stickers, and in response to popular demand, we’re bringing back 5 streamer stickers from the NS1 Season. Viewers will be rewarded for gifting subscriptions to these eligible streamers in the Arena Breakout: Infinite (ABI) category: ImOw, GL40LabsRaT, HITBOXKING, Arven93, LVNDMARK, QuattroAce, Kritikal, BakedJake, Ralisco. Support your favorite eligible streamers and receive the exclusive Stickers! Note that Viewers who claimed any of these streamer stickers during NS1 cannot re-claim the same stickers this time, and subscriptions will only count toward the event task if gifted while the streamer is live and broadcasting ABI content.
rewards.name: Partner Sticker Sub-Drops

rewards.description: ABI’s Full Release is now live! To celebrate the launch of S3 on Steam and Epic, watch Arena Breakout: Infinite content with enabled Twitch Drops to unlock up to 2 skins! Watch for 2 hours: claim the new season Exclusive Skin Reward - Plaster M24 Bolt-Action Rifle! Watch for 4 hours: claim the FRS Event Exclusive Reloaded Skin - DZ Style AKM Assault Rifle! Please link your Level Infinite Pass account and Twitch account on the event page (https://www.arenabreakoutinfinite.com/twitchdrops ), and claim your Drops rewards in time.
rewards.name: S3 Steam Launch Drops

Plus, don’t miss the Hero Drops campaign where you can get a €10 coupon to invest in Metin2. rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online - October

rewards.description: 2XKO is a free 2v2 fighting game featuring the iconic champions from League of Legends. To celebrate the launch of the game on October 7, we're kicking off a special Twitch Drop campaign featuring two exclusive in-game rewards: the exclusive "LIVE NOW" Player Card and Player Title. Fans can earn both by watching participating streamers from the 2XKO creator community as they queue up and join the fight. Just link your game account to Twitch, tune in during the campaign, and claim your rewards to get in on the action.
rewards.name: 2XKO Season 0 Launch

rewards.description:
Brand New [Homestead System] is available now! 
Coconut Spring Isle belongs to you and you only! Rally your pets and start turning Coconut Spring Isle into your dream home from scratch! Build anything you want, however you want! As your homestead level gradually increases, various buildings, scenic objects, vegetation, furniture, and decorations will become available for production! Use them to decorate your new home! 
Pet companions are essential powerful allies in building Coconut Spring Isle. All of your pet companions can join in the construction work of your new homestead! Different pets have different talents, so assign them work according to their strengths for maximum productivity! 
Crystal of Atlan is on Steam now! Add to wishlist and try demo on Steam Next Fest on October 13!
rewards.name: Home System & Steam Demo

rewards.name: Mo Power!

rewards.description: 🎃 Skelly Belly’s Spooktacular Bash 🎃  Hey Ghosts & Ghouls! 👻💀  Halloween has crept into Castle of Blackwater, and Skelly Belly is ready to rattle some bones! This October is your chance to claim the Skelly Belly Bundle, packed with frightfully fun cosmetics from a spooky skeleton costume to creepy accessories that’ll haunt your look forever. 🦴🕷️  Gather your friends, jump into the game, or tune into the stream to witness the haunted madness unfold.  So tell us… what terrifying tricks or tasty treats are you bringing to Skelly Belly’s Spooktacular Bash? 🍬🩸
rewards.name: Skelly’s Trick or Treat

rewards.description: Earn unique Halloween themed Drops for Coin Pusher Live!
rewards.name: Halloween Drops

rewards.description: The V2.7 Wuthering Waves Twitch Drops event has commenced!  By streaming Wuthering Waves, you enable your viewers to claim multiple rewards, including the Astrite!  Hasten to broadcast Wuthering Waves, and bestow rewards upon your devoted audience!
rewards.name: V2.7 Wuthering Waves

rewards.description: Subscribers with paid and gifted Tier 1 subscriptions will earn the “FABULOUS!” emote by subscribing to participating LoL Esports channels. By subscribing, fans will receive an enhanced viewing experience while providing direct support to their favorite leagues and teams.
rewards.name: Worlds - Sub Drop

rewards.description: This badge was earned by subscribing to a participating LoL Esports broadcast or co-stream of the 2025 League of Legends World Championship!
rewards.name: LoL Worlds 2025

rewards.description: Halloween Drops
rewards.name: Halloween Drops
